title: Braveâ€™s new De-AMP feature lets you easily bypass AMP pages
content:
After launching a crypto wallet back in November last year, popular Chromium-based browser Brave is now rolling out another useful feature. The new feature, called De-AMP, lets Brave users easily bypass pages rendered with Google’s Accelerated Mobile Pages (AMP) framework and takes them straight to the original website. In a blog post on the matter,

The post Brave’s new De-AMP feature lets you easily bypass AMP pages appeared first on xda-developers.
description: Popular Chromium-based browser Brave has introduced a new feature called De-AMP, which lets users easily bypass AMP pages.
